entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -27.6°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -30.9°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
